#### <mark>WILL YOU BUY MY VINTAGE <br> <br> FURNITURE?</mark>
<details><b>Yes!</b> We are always looking to purchase new items that fit our style. Send us some photos and we'll let you know if we're interested.</details>

***

#### <mark>DO YOU HAVE A STOREFRONT?</mark>
<details>We sell exclusively online and out of our apartment and storage unit in downtown Salt Lake City, UT.</details>

***

#### <mark>CAN YOU DELIVER?</mark>
<details><b>Yes</b>, we offer delivery on all of our items. Send us your zip code and we can provide a quote!</details>

***

#### <mark>WHEN CAN I PICK UP MY ITEMS?</mark>
<details>We have flexible schedules and can be available for pickup most weekdays and weekends. We require <b>pickup within 7-days</b> of purchase unless other arrangements have been made.</details>

***

#### <mark>I CAN'T PICK UP MY ITEM(S) FOR A <br> <br> FEW WEEKS. CAN YOU HOLD FOR <br> <br> EXTENDED PERIODS?</mark>
<details>Yes, we can hold your purchased item(s) in our storage unit for up to one month. After the first 7-days following your purchase, we charge a storage fee of $10/day. <b>Arrangements must be made in advance.</b></details>
